div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: *High School Students* The final packets will be available for pickup on May 8 from 9-3. You may turn in completed work at this time. Senior questionnaires need to be completed and returned ASAP! You may email them to JL at the Wildcat or place in Mrs. Goodloe's mailbox at home.

Parents/guardians and Seniors,
Mr. Valeriano has created some graduation options that he would like to share. All options are dependent upon restrictions mandated by the state. He will continue to keep you updated. See the image for graduation options!

PK PRE-REGISTRATON
If you have a child that will be 4 years old on or before Sept. 1, 2020, please pick up a pre-registration packet at the Elementary School on Thurs., May 14th from 9:00a.m. to 3:00p.m. The packets will be outside the school office and they will be due on Monday, May 18th.

Si tiene usted un hijo/a que tiene 4 anos de edad en o antes del 1st de septiembre, 2020, favor de venir a levantar una paquete de pre-inscripcion para Pre-Kinder en la escuela primaria el jueves, 14 de mayo de 9:00 a.m. to 3:00p.m. Los paquetes seran fuera de la oficina y se les debe volver el lunes 18 de mayo.

The high school counselors are not in the office at this time. To contact Miss Venable or Mrs. Barajas please email them directly. A complete listing of staff email addresses can be found in the staff directory on the website. Thank you!

p.a: Event: OUT OF SCHOOL UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
